Title: 1. Saving Private Ryan
Description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.

Title: 2. Armageddon
Description: After discovering that an asteroid the size of Texas will impact Earth in less than a month, NASA recruits a misfit team of deep-core drillers to save the planet.

Title: 3. There's Something About Mary
Description: A man gets a chance to meet up with his dream girl from high school, even though his date with her back then was a complete disaster.

Title: 4. A Bug's Life
Description: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

Title: 5. The Waterboy
Description: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

Title: 6. Doctor Dolittle
Description: A doctor discovers that he can communicate with animals.

Title: 7. Rush Hour
Description: A loyal and dedicated Hong Kong Inspector teams up with a reckless and loudmouthed L.A.P.D. detective to rescue the Chinese Consul's kidnapped daughter, while trying to arrest a dangerous crime lord along the way.

Title: 8. Deep Impact
Description: A comet is discovered to be on a collision course with Earth. As doomsday nears, the human race prepares for the worst.

Title: 9. Godzilla
Description: French nuclear tests irradiate an iguana into a giant monster that heads off to New York City. The American military must chase the monster across the city to stop it before it reproduces.

Title: 10. Patch Adams
Description: The true story of a heroic man, Hunter "Patch" Adams, determined to become a medical doctor because he enjoys helping people. He ventured where no doctor had ventured before, using humour and pathos.

Title: 11. Lethal Weapon 4
Description: With personal crises and age weighing in on them, LAPD officers Riggs and Murtaugh must contend with deadly Chinese triads that are trying to free their former leaders out of prison and onto American soil.

Title: 12. The Truman Show
Description: An insurance salesman begins to suspect that his whole life is actually some sort of reality TV show.

Title: 13. Mulan
Description: To save her father from death in the army, a young maiden secretly goes in his place and becomes one of China's greatest heroines in the process.

Title: 14. You've Got Mail
Description: Book superstore magnate Joe Fox and independent book shop owner Kathleen Kelly fall in love in the anonymity of the Internet, both blissfully unaware that he's trying to put her out of business.

Title: 15. Enemy of the State
Description: A lawyer becomes targeted by a corrupt politician and his N.S.A. goons when he accidentally receives key evidence to a politically motivated crime.

Title: 16. The Prince of Egypt
Description: Egyptian Prince Moses learns of his identity as a Hebrew and his destiny to become the chosen deliverer of his people.

Title: 17. The Rugrats Movie
Description: The babies gets lost in the forest after Tommy Pickles gets a new baby brother.

Title: 18. Shakespeare in Love
Description: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

Title: 19. The Mask of Zorro
Description: A young thief seeking revenge for his brother's death is trained by the once-great, aging Zorro, who is pursuing his own vengeance.

Title: 20. Stepmom
Description: A terminally ill woman must deal with her ex-husband's new lover, who will be their children's stepmother.

Title: 21. Antz
Description: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

Title: 22. Pokémon: The First Movie - Mewtwo Strikes Back
Description: Scientists genetically create a new Pokémon, Mewtwo, but the results are horrific and disastrous.

Title: 23. The X Files
Description: Mulder and Scully must fight the government in a conspiracy and find the truth about an alien colonization of Earth.

Title: 24. The Wedding Singer
Description: Robbie, a singer, and Julia, a waitress, are both engaged, but to the wrong people. Fortune intervenes to help them discover each other.

Title: 25. City of Angels
Description: An angel on Earth, a doctor unable to believe, a patient with a secret, a love story made in Heaven.

Title: 26. The Horse Whisperer
Description: The mother of a severely traumatized daughter enlists the aid of a unique horse trainer to help the girl's equally injured horse.

Title: 27. Six Days Seven Nights
Description: Robin Monroe, a New York magazine editor, and the gruff pilot Quinn Harris must put aside their mutual dislike if they are to survive after crash landing on a deserted South Seas island.

Title: 28. Star Trek: Insurrection
Description: When the crew of the Enterprise learn of a Federation conspiracy against the inhabitants of a unique planet, Captain Picard begins an open rebellion.

Title: 29. Blade
Description: A half-vampire, half-mortal man becomes a protector of the mortal race, while slaying evil vampires.

Title: 30. Lost in Space
Description: The Robinson family was going into space to fight for a chance for humanity. Now they are fighting to live long enough to find a way home.

Title: 31. A Perfect Murder
Description: Wealthy Wall Street speculator Steven Taylor finds that his wife Emily Bradford has a lover, struggling artist David Shaw. Steven investigates Shaw and manipulates him into murdering Emily. It seems like a perfect crime.

Title: 32. The Parent Trap
Description: Identical twins Annie and Hallie, separated at birth and each raised by one of their biological parents, discover each other for the first time at summer camp and make a plan to bring their wayward parents back together.

Title: 33. Ever After: A Cinderella Story
Description: The Brothers Grimm arrive at the home of a wealthy Grande Dame who speaks of the many legends surrounding the fable of the cinder girl before telling the "true" story of her ancestor.

Title: 34. Hope Floats
Description: Birdee Calvert must choose between her morals and her heart after her husband divorces her and a charming young man, who her daughter disapproves of, comes back into her life.

Title: 35. U.S. Marshals
Description: U.S. Marshal Samuel Gerard and his team of Marshals are assigned to track down Sheridan, who has been accused of a double-murder.

Title: 36. The Man in the Iron Mask
Description: The cruel King Louis XIV of France has a secret twin brother whom he keeps imprisoned. Can the twin be substituted for the real king?

Title: 37. A Civil Action
Description: At the risk of bankrupting his firm and career, lawyer Jan Schlichtman takes on a case involving two companies responsible for causing children to be diagnosed with leukemia due to the town's contaminated water supply.

Title: 38. Snake Eyes
Description: Corrupt Atlantic City police officer Rick Santoro and Navy Commander Kevin Dunn join forces to investigate both the assassination of Secretary of Defense Charles Kirkland and the disappearance of a beautiful stranger.

Title: 39. What Dreams May Come
Description: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

Title: 40. Halloween H20: 20 Years Later
Description: Laurie Strode, now the dean of a Northern California private school with an assumed name, must battle the Shape one last time, as the life of her own son hangs in the balance.

Title: 41. Small Soldiers
Description: When missile technology is used to enhance toy action figures, the toys soon begin to take their battle programming too seriously.

Title: 42. T-Rex: Back to the Cretaceous
Description: A youth who finds a dinosaur egg accidentally breaks it. Soon after, she begins to have surreal visions of dinosaurs, including the Tyrannosaurus Rex.

Title: 43. Mighty Joe Young
Description: A legendary fifteen-foot tall mountain gorilla named Joe is taken to an animal sanctuary in California by zoologist Gregg O'Hara (Bill Paxton) and Jill Young (Charlize Theron), with whom he grew up. Poacher Strasser (Rade Serbedzija) returns from the past to seek vengeance on Joe.

Title: 44. Practical Magic
Description: Two witch sisters, raised by their eccentric aunts in a small town, face closed-minded prejudice and a curse which threatens to prevent them ever finding lasting love.

Title: 45. Meet Joe Black
Description: Death, who takes the form of a young man killed in an accident, asks a media mogul to act as his guide to teach him about life on Earth and, in the process, he falls in love with the mogul's daughter.

Title: 46. The Negotiator
Description: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

Title: 47. Ronin
Description: A freelancing former U.S. Intelligence Agent tries to track down a mysterious package that is wanted by the Irish and the Russians.

Title: 48. The Siege
Description: The secret U.S. abduction of a suspected terrorist leads to a wave of terrorist attacks in New York City, which leads to the declaration of martial-law.

Title: 49. Pleasantville
Description: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves transported to a 1950s sitcom where their influence begins to profoundly change that colorless, complacent world.

Title: 50. The Faculty
Description: When Casey Connor, Herrington High School's newspaper photographer, witnesses the murder of a nurse and sees her alive again, he decides to investigate the bizarre happenings.

Title: 51. I Still Know What You Did Last Summer
Description: The murderous fisherman with a hook is back to once again stalk the two surviving teens, Julie and Ray, who had left him for dead, as well as cause even more murder and mayhem, this time at a posh island resort.

Title: 52. Primary Colors
Description: A man joins the political campaign of a smooth-operator candidate for President of the United States of America.

Title: 53. Urban Legend
Description: A college student suspects a series of bizarre deaths are connected to certain urban legends.

Title: 54. How Stella Got Her Groove Back
Description: Stella is a highly successful, forty-something San Francisco stock broker who is persuaded by her colorful New York girlfriend Delilah to take a well deserved, first-class vacation to Jamaica.

Title: 55. Out of Sight
Description: A career bank robber breaks out of jail, and shares a moment of mutual attraction with a U.S. Marshal he has kidnapped.

Title: 56. Sphere
Description: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.

Title: 57. The Thin Red Line
Description: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

Title: 58. Jack Frost
Description: A father who can't keep his promises is killed in a car accident. One year later, he returns as a snowman who has the final chance to put things right with his son before he is gone forever.

Title: 59. Mercury Rising
Description: Shadowy elements in the NSA target a nine-year old autistic savant for death when he is able to decipher a top secret code.

Title: 60. Bride of Chucky
Description: Chucky, the doll possessed by a serial killer, discovers the perfect mate to kill and revive into the body of another doll.

Title: 61. A Night at the Roxbury
Description: Two dim-witted brothers dream of owning their own dance club or at least getting into the coolest and most exclusive club in town, The Roxbury.

Title: 62. Wild Things
Description: A police detective uncovers a conspiracy behind a case involving a high-school guidance counselor when accusations of rape are made against him by two female students.

Title: 63. Elizabeth
Description: The early years of the reign of Elizabeth I of England and her difficult task of learning what is necessary to be a monarch.

Title: 64. Madeline
Description: Horrified at the prospect of her beloved school being sold, a young French girl uses her wit and craftiness to attempt to save it, making an unlikely new friend in the process.

Title: 65. The Object of My Affection
Description: A pregnant New York City social worker begins to develop romantic feelings for her gay best friend, and decides she'd rather raise her child with him, much to the dismay of her overbearing boyfriend.

Title: 66. The Big Hit
Description: Socially anxious hitman Melvin Smiley, an expert in his lucrative field, goes on a job and falls in love with his kidnapping victim, turning his world upside down.

Title: 67. Paulie
Description: A talking parrot named Paulie recounts his travels to look for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.

Title: 68. Bulworth
Description: A suicidally disillusioned liberal politician puts a contract out on himself and takes the opportunity to be bluntly honest with his voters by affecting the rhythms and speech of hip-hop music and culture.

Title: 69. Great Expectations
Description: Modernization of Charles Dickens' classic story finds the hapless Finn as a painter in New York City pursuing his unrequited and haughty childhood love.

Title: 70. Can't Hardly Wait
Description: A complete graduating class, consisting of beautiful girls, geeks and promising footballers, assemble at a rich classmate's residence for a party. Interesting developments follow at the get-together.

Title: 71. Fallen
Description: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution, the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

Title: 72. Waking Ned Devine
Description: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

Title: 73. The Avengers
Description: Two British Agents team up to stop Sir August de Wynter from destroying the world with a weather-changing machine.

Title: 74. One True Thing
Description: A career woman reassesses her parents' lives after she is forced to care for her cancer-stricken mother.

Title: 75. The Players Club
Description: A woman must contend with rival strippers and her boss in an attempt to make a legitimate living.

Title: 76. Rounders
Description: A young, reformed gambler must return to playing high stakes poker to help a friend pay off loan sharks, while balancing his relationship with his girlfriend and his commitments to law school.

Title: 77. Beloved
Description: A slave is visited by the spirit of a mysterious young woman.

Title: 78. Quest for Camelot
Description: An adventurous girl, a young blind hermit, and a goofy two-headed dragon race to find the lost sword Excalibur to save King Arthur and Camelot from disaster.

Title: 79. He Got Game
Description: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

Title: 80. Psycho
Description: In Gus Van Sant's remake of Alfred Hitchcock's classic, young female bank employee Marion Crane steals money from her boss in Phoenix, flees town, and arrives at Fairvale, California's rundown Bates Motel, which has secrets of its own.

Title: 81. Vampires
Description: Recovering from an ambush that killed his entire team, a vengeful vampire slayer must retrieve an ancient Catholic relic that, should it be acquired by vampires, will allow them to walk in sunlight.

Title: 82. Mafia!
Description: Takeoff on the Godfather with the son of a mafia king taking over for his dying father.

Title: 83. Hard Rain
Description: The partner and nephew of an armored-truck driver tries to prevent three million dollars from being taken by a gang during a catastrophic flooding caused by a severe storm.

Title: 84. The Big Lebowski
Description: Jeff "The Dude" Lebowski, mistaken for a millionaire of the same name, seeks restitution for his ruined rug and enlists his bowling buddies to help get it.

Title: 85. Species II
Description: An astronaut gets infected with alien DNA during the first mission on Mars and runs amok on earth. Preston and Laura team up with a peaceful, genetically re-engineered Sil to track the monster down.

Title: 86. The Replacement Killers
Description: A troubled hitman seeks aid from a forger to help him get papers to China. However, the drug lord has hired replacements to finish the job, and kill the hitman.

Title: 87. The Odd Couple II
Description: Oscar and Felix take a road trip to their son and daughter's wedding.

Title: 88. Babe: Pig in the City
Description: Babe, fresh from his victory in the sheepherding contest, returns to Farmer Hoggett's farm, but after Farmer Hoggett is injured and unable to work, Babe has to go to the big city to save the farm.

Title: 89. Simon Birch
Description: A young boy with stunted growth is convinced that God has a great purpose for him.

Title: 90. Disturbing Behavior
Description: The new kid in Cradle Bay, Washington stumbles across something sinister about the town's method of transforming its unruly teens into upstanding citizens.

Title: 91. Half Baked
Description: The story of three not so bright men who come up with a series of crazy schemes to get a friend out of jail.

Title: 92. Rushmore
Description: A teenager at Rushmore Academy falls for a much older teacher and befriends a middle-aged industrialist. Later, he finds out that his love interest and his friend are having an affair, which prompts him to begin a vendetta.
The famous 1970s New York City nightclub seen and told through the eyes of a young employee.

Title: 94. A Simple Plan
Description: Two brothers and a friend, all blue-collar workers, come across millions of dollars in lost cash and make a plan to keep their find from the authorities, but it isn't long before complications and mistrust weave their way into the plan.

Title: 95. Dance with Me
Description: Rafael Infante (Chayanne) comes to Houston from Cuba to work at John Burnett's (Kris Kristofferson's) dance studio. He meets Ruby Sinclair (Vanessa Williams), a cute dance instructor there. Chemistry? Will John know he's Rafael's dad?

Title: 96. Dead Man on Campus
Description: Two college roommates go out and party, resulting in bad grades. They learn of the clause that says, "If your roommate dies, you get an A," and decide to find someone who is on the verge, so to speak, to move in with them.

Title: 97. Twilight
Description: A retired detective accepts a simple task, unaware that it will tear open old, forgotten, but deadly wounds.

Title: 98. Soldier
Description: A soldier trained from birth is deemed obsolete and dumped on a waste planet where he is reluctantly taken in by a community of defenseless, stranded wayfarers.

Title: 99. Dark City
Description: A man struggles with memories of his past, which include a wife he cannot remember and a nightmarish world no one else ever seems to wake up from.

Title: 100. Les Misérables
Description: Valjean, a former criminal, has atoned for his past and now finds himself in the midst of the French Revolution, avoiding a law-obsessed policeman hell-bent on capturing him.
